price: Sabõda haka tsarkakẽwa ta tabbata ga Allah a lõkacin da kuke shiga maraice, da lõkacin da kuke shiga sãfiya.*
arabic: فَسُبۡحَٰنَ ٱللَّهِ حِينَ تُمۡسُونَ وَحِينَ تُصۡبِحُونَ
footnotes: * Akwai dangantaka a tsakãnin tasbĩhi, watau ibãda da rãyuwa, da tsakãnin fitar hantsi da sãfiya kamar yadda yake akwai dangantaka a tsakãnin mutuwa da maraice, da yamma da kãfirci.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fasub'ḥāna al-lahi ḥīna tum'sūna waḥīna tuṣ'biḥūna
